metadata.name: Configuration Management Learnings
metadata.description: Critical learnings from configuration failures and environment management issues

learning.title: Staging Database URL Falls Back to Development Localhost
learning.problem: In staging environment, app uses localhost:5432/netra instead of Cloud SQL staging-shared-postgres with database netra_staging. This indicates environment variable loading failure or incorrect configuration cascade.
learning.root_cause: - #removed-legacyenvironment variable not properly loaded in staging - Configuration system allows localhost fallback even in staging environment - No validation that staging environment uses appropriate database configuration - Environment detection (NETRA_ENVIRONMENT, K_SERVICE) not enforcing staging requirements

symptoms.symptom: Database connections attempt localhost:5432 in staging
App falls back to development database name "netra" instead of "netra_staging"
No errors raised when staging uses development configuration

prevention_measures.measure: Validate #removed-legacyin staging startup to reject localhost patterns
Enforce staging-specific database names and hosts
Add environment detection that prevents inappropriate fallbacks
Create failing tests that verify staging configuration requirements

learning.title: ClickHouse Connection Timeout to Staging Service
learning.problem: Cannot connect to clickhouse.staging.netrasystems.ai:8123, resulting in connection timeouts and ClickHouse service unavailability in staging environment.
learning.root_cause: - ClickHouse environment variables not properly loaded (CLICKHOUSE_URL, CLICKHOUSE_HOST, CLICKHOUSE_PORT) - Connection timeout settings too aggressive for network conditions - ClickHouse service may not be accessible from staging infrastructure - No retry logic or connection health validation

symptoms.symptom: Socket timeouts when connecting to clickhouse.staging.netrasystems.ai:8123
No fallback or graceful degradation for ClickHouse unavailability

prevention_measures.measure: Validate ClickHouse connectivity during startup health checks
Configure appropriate timeout values for staging network conditions
Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
Verify ClickHouse service accessibility from staging infrastructure

learning.title: Redis Connection Failure with Fallback Mode in Staging
learning.problem: Redis connections fail in staging environment, causing app to fall back to no-Redis mode. This fallback behavior is acceptable in development but should not be allowed in staging.
learning.root_cause: - Redis environment variables not properly configured (REDIS_URL, REDIS_HOST, REDIS_PORT) - Redis fallback mode enabled in staging environment - No enforcement that critical services must work in staging - Redis connection settings inappropriate for staging infrastructure

symptoms.symptom: Redis connection attempts fail with socket errors
App continues running in no-Redis mode without failing
Caching and session management degraded silently

prevention_measures.measure: Disable Redis fallback mode in staging environment
Make Redis connectivity mandatory in staging (REDIS_REQUIRED=true)
Validate Redis connectivity in startup health checks
Ensure Redis service is accessible from staging infrastructure

learning.title: Deprecated WebSocket Import Paths Still in Use
learning.problem: Codebase still uses deprecated import paths like "from starlette.websockets import WebSocketDisconnect" instead of modern FastAPI import patterns. This creates inconsistency and potential compatibility issues.
learning.root_cause: - Legacy code patterns not updated to modern FastAPI imports - No enforcement of modern import patterns in pre-commit hooks - Inconsistent import preferences across different modules - No centralized guidance on preferred import patterns

symptoms.symptom: Mix of "from starlette.websockets" and "from fastapi" imports
Potential deprecation warnings in newer versions

prevention_measures.measure: Standardize on FastAPI imports for WebSocket functionality
Add pre-commit hooks to detect deprecated import patterns
Create migration guide for updating import patterns
Update existing code to use modern import patterns

practice.title: Staging Environment Enforcement
practice.description: Staging environment MUST enforce production-like configuration requirements and reject development fallbacks to prevent configuration drift.

implementation.step: Check NETRA_ENVIRONMENT and K_SERVICE environment variables
When staging detected, reject localhost, development database names
Require all critical services (database, Redis, ClickHouse) to be accessible
Fail fast during startup if configuration is inappropriate for environment

practice.title: Critical Service Validation
practice.description: All critical external services must be validated during application startup, with appropriate timeout and retry configurations for the target environment.

implementation.step: Test database connectivity with environment-appropriate SSL settings
Validate ClickHouse accessibility with realistic timeouts
Confirm Redis connectivity and disable fallback in staging
Use health check endpoints that test real service connectivity

practice.title: Modern Import Pattern Enforcement
practice.description: Use consistent, modern import patterns throughout the codebase, preferring FastAPI imports over deprecated Starlette patterns.

implementation.step: Add linting rules to detect deprecated import patterns
Update legacy code during maintenance cycles

requirement.title: Environment-Specific Configuration Tests
requirement.description: Every environment (development, staging, production) must have specific tests that validate configuration requirements for that environment.

test_patterns.pattern: Test environment variable loading from IsolatedEnvironment
Validate appropriate database URLs for each environment
Test configuration cascade and fallback behavior

requirement.title: Critical Service Connectivity Tests
requirement.description: Integration tests must validate that all critical services are accessible with the loaded configuration, using realistic timeout and retry settings.

test_patterns.pattern: Database connection tests with SSL parameter resolution
ClickHouse connectivity with staging host/port configuration
Redis connection validation and fallback mode testing
Network-level connectivity testing with socket connections

value_impact.impact: Ensures staging environment mirrors production configuration
Reduces deployment failures due to configuration issues
Enables reliable testing with production-like configurations

metrics.metric: Modern import patterns adopted throughout codebase
